definition[0]: very concerned about small, usually unimportant details, and difficult to please
example[0]: A lot of small children are fussy eaters  (=they dislike many types of food).
example[1]: ‘Do you want to go out or just rent a movie?’ ‘I’m not fussy’ (=I don’t mind).
example[2]: Sue was fussy about her looks.
definition[1]: fussy clothes, objects, buildings etc are very detailed and decorated – used to show disapproval
example[3]: The furniture looked comfortable, nothing fussy or too elaborate.
definition[2]: with small, exact, and careful actions, sometimes showing nervousness
example[4]: She patted her hair with small fussy movements.
